name: Lucky simulation project
description:
"Introduction:
Simulate a sunny and beautiful boy. It has been three months since he graduated from college. He still hasn't found a job. If he can't find a job and earn one million gold coins quickly, he has to go back to the countryside to marry the village flower and inherit the 100,000 yuan from your family.
Cattle and sheep spend the rest of their lives. This work may require some knowledge of project management. The inspiration comes from the author's understanding of the boring teaching courses in the process of learning the knowledge of IT project management.
The original idea is to use it as a fully automatically generated project process to simulate some things that project managers often encounter in projects, so various choices in the work may have different results from various tutorials.
It may be helpful for the study of project management, and it may also cause a deviation in the understanding of project management.
Comes with Lianliankan, jigsaw puzzle, Xiaoxiaole, Huarongdao and other small games to ease the boring process of the project.
Entertainment products, please treat them rationally.
Partial hardcore game

How to play:
1. Make reasonable choices in the face of different events to get rewards and experience points (a certain amount of project management knowledge is required).
2. You can get paid by completing mini games (with certain difficulty).
3. After achieving certain achievements, the opposite sex can be unlocked, and attributes can be obtained randomly during the interaction with the opposite sex.
4. Attributes will affect settlement rewards.
5. A failed choice will lead to dismissal from the company and game failure.

Goal:
Obtain the million gold coin badge and 4 opposite sex tokens.

Dubbing:
All are machine-generated and can be turned off in the system settings.

Prohibited items:
It is forbidden to replace files and interactive videos in the root directory of the game, otherwise it will affect the experience."
